name: The Last Pilot
description:
LowRezJam Game Jam 2022 submission: A SHMUP about the last pilot left having to take on an invasion fleet on their own.  Using the suggested theme "you are the last hope".

Game controls:

SPACE: Shoot

WASD: Move

I could only complete 3 very short levels in the 14 days of the jam but I learned a lot and had fun creating this.

Made with Electron.

Credits:

Eric Matyas for his royalty free music.

https://soundimage.org/

SFX were sourced from https://freesound.org/, credits in the txt file in the sfx folder.
